channel.title: Can't get email address to verify
channel.description: I made a new Live email address. It gives me a verification email. I try to log into my inbox. It says "The .NET Passport or Windows Live ID you are signed into is not supported. Please set up a free email account." What other ways can I use to go into my inbox?

item.title: Can't get email address to verify
item.dc:creator: @afi afi
item.description:
@afi wrote:

http://passport.net ?

Read full topic
item.source: Can't get email address to verify
